attributes.action: encourage Dorsetians to be more inquisitive about the world. Like me.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Lots of people and animals are happy to go about their daily business without giving any thought to matters they either half know or simply don't know the truth about. But this should not be. Everyone should have a thirst for knowledge and a desire to find things out! Inquisitiveness should not be the exception but second nature.
(you can learn more at http://callyskitchenindex.blogspot.com/2006/07/inquisitive-cow.html)

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
